dcterms:creator: P. Young
A. Lai
M. Hodosh
J. Hockenmaier
dcterms:description: Flickr30K contains 31,700 images, with each one paired with 5 sentences. The dataset is used to evaluate the performance of image-text retrieval models.
dcterms:title: Flickr30K

dcterms:creator: A. Karpathy
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: MSCOCO-1K contains 123,287 images, where each image is paired with 5 sentences. The dataset is split into training, validation, and testing sets for evaluating image-text retrieval models.
dcterms:title: MSCOCO-1K
